1: I embrace the life-giving truth I have personally experienced.
2: I share the joy of eternal life with others.
3: I share what I have witnessed to build our community together.
4: I find joy in sharing and connecting with others.
5: God is pure light, bringing clarity and positivity.
6: I share in light and live honestly.
7: Walking in the light brings us together in fellowship.
8: Acknowledging my flaws brings clarity and growth to my life.
9: Confessing leads to forgiveness and a fresh start.
10: I acknowledge my mistakes and embrace truth.
